title: Mayura Jhumki: Diamond and Ruby-Accented Peacock Earrings
materials: 18K Rose Gold. Accentuated with brilliant-cut diamonds (0.74 carats total weight
and mixed gemstones (1.92 carats total weight).
features: These exquisite jhumka earrings feature a stylized peacock (Mayura) design. Fine milgrain detailing enhances the contours, and the peacock's 'eye' is subtly highlighted by a small, sparkling ruby. The bottom portion features dangling pink gemstones, reminiscent of a flower. The diamonds are set in a pave style to maximize brilliance. Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures enduring beauty.
colors: and pastel pink gemstones create a harmonious and elegant color palette.
occasions: and other special occasions. These jhumkas also add a touch of elegance to modern cocktail parties and gatherings.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece combines traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The use of rose gold and carefully selected gemstones enhances its beauty and value. The Mayura design symbolizes beauty, royalty, and prosperity. A timeless piece to be treasured for generations.
